Uses of Interface
com.gemstone.gemfire.pdx.PdxInstanceFactory

  • Packages that use PdxInstanceFactory 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache
    Provides an implementation of distributed object caching that can leverage GemFire's distribution capabilities.
    com.gemstone.gemfire.pdx
    The com.gemstone.gemfire.pdx package provides APIs used for object serialization.

    • Uses of PdxInstanceFactory in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache

      Methods in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache that return PdxInstanceFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PdxInstanceFactory RegionService.createPdxInstanceFactory(String className)
      Returns a factory that can create a PdxInstance.

      PdxInstanceFactory PdxInstanceFactory.markIdentityField(String fieldName)
